configurationProperties.name: infinispan.distance
configurationProperties.description: Distance metric for similarity (3 for cosine)
configurationProperties.label: Distance

configurationProperties.name: infinispan.create.cache
configurationProperties.description: Whether to create cache if it doesn't exist
configurationProperties.label: Create Cache

configurationProperties.name: chroma.url
configurationProperties.description: The URL of the Chroma server
configurationProperties.label: URL

configurationProperties.name: chroma.collection.name
configurationProperties.description: The name of the collection to use
configurationProperties.label: Collection Name

configurationProperties.name: redis.distance.metric
configurationProperties.description: Distance metric for similarity search (COSINE, L2, IP)
configurationProperties.label: Distance Metric

configurationProperties.name: pgvector.use.index
configurationProperties.description: Enable vector index for faster search
configurationProperties.label: Use Index

configurationProperties.name: pgvector.index.list.size
configurationProperties.description: Index list size for IVFFlat index
configurationProperties.label: Index List Size

configurationProperties.name: pgvector.create.table
configurationProperties.description: Automatically create table if it does not exist
configurationProperties.label: Create Table

configurationProperties.name: milvus.index.type
configurationProperties.description: Index type for vector search (e.g., IVF_FLAT, HNSW)
configurationProperties.label: Index Type

configurationProperties.name: milvus.metric.type
configurationProperties.description: Distance metric type (e.g., COSINE, L2, IP)
configurationProperties.label: Metric Type

configurationProperties.name: milvus.consistency.level
configurationProperties.description: Consistency level for queries (e.g., STRONG, EVENTUALLY)
configurationProperties.label: Consistency Level

configurationProperties.name: milvus.retrieve.embeddings.on.search
configurationProperties.description: Whether to retrieve embeddings in search results
configurationProperties.label: Retrieve Embeddings

configurationProperties.name: milvus.auto.flush.on.insert
configurationProperties.description: Automatically flush data after insert operations
configurationProperties.label: Auto Flush

configurationProperties.name: weaviate.use.grpc.for.inserts
configurationProperties.description: Use gRPC protocol for insert operations
configurationProperties.label: Use gRPC for Inserts

configurationProperties.name: qdrant.payload.text.key
configurationProperties.description: Payload key for storing text content
configurationProperties.label: Payload Text Key

configurationProperties.name: pinecone.metadata.text.key
configurationProperties.description: Metadata key for storing text content
configurationProperties.label: Metadata Text Key

configurationProperties.name: pinecone.create.index
configurationProperties.description: Create index if it does not exist
configurationProperties.label: Create Index

configurationProperties.label: Server List

configurationProperties.name: infinispan.cache-name
configurationProperties.description: Name of the cache for storing chat messages
configurationProperties.label: Cache Name

configurationProperties.name: infinispan.pool.max-active
configurationProperties.description: Maximum number of active connections per server

configurationProperties.description: Minimum number of idle connections per server
configurationProperties.label: Pool Min Idle

configurationProperties.name: infinispan.pool.max-wait
configurationProperties.description: Maximum time to wait for a connection in milliseconds
configurationProperties.label: Pool Max Wait

configurationProperties.name: redis.host
configurationProperties.description: Redis server hostname or IP address
configurationProperties.label: Host

configurationProperties.name: redis.database
configurationProperties.description: Redis database number to connect to
configurationProperties.label: Database

configurationProperties.name: redis.pool.max-total
configurationProperties.description: Maximum number of connections in the pool
configurationProperties.label: Pool Max Total

configurationProperties.name: redis.pool.max-idle
configurationProperties.description: Maximum number of idle connections in the pool
configurationProperties.label: Pool Max Idle

configurationProperties.name: redis.pool.min-idle
configurationProperties.description: Minimum number of idle connections in the pool
configurationProperties.label: Pool Min Idle

configurationProperties.name: redis.pool.test-on-borrow
configurationProperties.description: Test connections when borrowing from pool
configurationProperties.label: Test On Borrow

configurationProperties.name: redis.pool.test-on-return
configurationProperties.description: Test connections when returning to pool
configurationProperties.label: Test On Return

configurationProperties.name: redis.pool.max-wait-millis
configurationProperties.description: Maximum time to wait for a connection from the pool in milliseconds
configurationProperties.label: Pool Max Wait

beans.name: message-window
beans.description: In-memory storage with configurable message window size

configurationProperties.name: azure.openai.api.key
configurationProperties.description: Azure OpenAI API key for authentication
configurationProperties.label: API Key

configurationProperties.name: azure.openai.endpoint
configurationProperties.description: Azure OpenAI resource endpoint URL (e.g., https://your-resource.openai.azure.com/)
configurationProperties.label: Endpoint

configurationProperties.name: azure.openai.deployment.name
configurationProperties.description: Azure OpenAI deployment name (e.g., gpt-35-turbo, gpt-4)
configurationProperties.label: Deployment Name

configurationProperties.name: azure.openai.temperature
configurationProperties.description: Temperature for response generation (0.0-2.0): lower values are more deterministic, higher values are more creative
configurationProperties.label: Temperature

configurationProperties.name: azure.openai.max.tokens
configurationProperties.description: Maximum number of tokens in the model's response
configurationProperties.label: Max Tokens

configurationProperties.name: azure.openai.presence.penalty
configurationProperties.description: Presence penalty for discouraging new topic introduction (-2.0 to 2.0)
configurationProperties.label: Presence Penalty

configurationProperties.name: azure.openai.frequency.penalty
configurationProperties.description: Frequency penalty for discouraging token repetition (-2.0 to 2.0)
configurationProperties.label: Frequency Penalty

configurationProperties.name: azure.openai.seed
configurationProperties.description: Seed for deterministic response generation (same seed + same input = similar output)
configurationProperties.label: Seed

configurationProperties.name: azure.openai.user
configurationProperties.description: User identifier for tracking and monitoring API usage
configurationProperties.label: User ID

configurationProperties.name: azure.openai.max.retries
configurationProperties.description: Maximum number of retry attempts for failed requests
configurationProperties.label: Max Retries

configurationProperties.name: azure.openai.log.requests.and.responses
configurationProperties.description: Enable logging of requests and responses (warning: may log sensitive data)
configurationProperties.label: Log Requests
